Summary: TRIANGLE IN SHAPE ,BRIGHT.WITH LOTS OF LIGHTS
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Chickasha
There were no other sightings in Chickasha on or around October 5th 1978
divs: sighting detailsgot home from work noticed a bright light in the west(maybe 10 miles away) w\ the setting sun. went to tell my mom and dad they came out to see but not too concerned. cleaned up put on clean clothes went to town and drove out to see it. it was very close hovering above the ground (maybe 100') no noise just hovering w\ bright lights. then it took off w\ a high rate of speed w\ military jets following it but they could not keep up and it flew towards the northeast.never heard any more about it. told people about it they thought i had too much to drink or just laugh. ther was other people who stopped but they were down the highway on the shoulder on us 62.
